body.name: AROEVE Air Purifiers For Home Large Room Up to 1395 Sq Ft with Air Quality Laser Sensors, H13 True HEPA Filter, Washable Filters, Filters Pet Dander, Pollen, Smoke, Dust for Bedroom Office, MK07 White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 50 mins
features: High Purification Efficiency: The AROEVE MK07 air purifier has a high CADR of 176 CFM / 300m³/h, equipped with a large intake for efficient removal of tiny particles and pollutants. It covers spaces up to 1395ft², ensuring your home is consistently filled with fresh air.

Smart Sensing, Real Insight: Visual air quality indicators and precision advanced sensors provide an intuitive and precise awareness of tiny particles in your surroundings. With millisecond-level air detection, it accurately measures PM1 levels, surpassing other products that only detect PM2.5. Lets you truly sense the freshness and quality of the air.
UV protection: Using UV technology provides an additional defense layer, helping to reduce harmful particle in the air and ensuring a safe and healthy environment.

Comprehensive Defense: This air purifiers, equipped with H13 true HEPA, activated carbon, and a pre-filter, effectively removing 99.9% of particles and odors. The HEPA layer captures pet dander and pollen, while activated carbon neutralizes odors, smoke, and VOCs. The washable filter included blocks pet hair, extending its lifespan for all-around purification.

Quiet and Calming: With advanced technology, this air purifier keeps noise levels close to a whisper at 23dB. Choose the sleep mode at night for a peaceful rest. AROEVE MK07 eliminates the disturbance of typical air purifier sounds. Ideal for bedrooms, offices, or living rooms.

Operation and Care: The smart touchscreen ensures easy operation. For better performance, replace the HEPA filter every 4-8 months (non-washable). Use only genuine AROEVE MK07 replacement filters to avoid damage. Regularly check and clean the washable filter.
If you have any question, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Pet Dander Protection Our furry friends, wonderful as they are as companions, emit fur and odors into the air, leading to discomfort when breathed in. Harmful Particles Protection Although certain things may be invisible, it doesn't mean they don't exist. Harmful particles, though invisible, float in the air, Unconsciously to be inhaled by people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great air purifier
reviews.reviewText: Works great I use it in my apartment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its good to have an air purifier
reviews.reviewText: This is a four stage air purifier--being that it has a washable air filter, the HEPA filter, the charcoal filter, and the UV light filter. The charcoal filter is attached to the back of the HEPA filter as one unit. The true HEPA filter can remove 99.97% particles and the the charcoal filter assisting by also removing particles and odors.I wish I would have had this air purifier last year when we had all those wildfires up north. Hopefully I won't need it for that this year. The UV filter I personally could do without---as UV filters tend to create ozone and I also have hydroponics likely creating some ozone. That can actually worsen some asthma conditions. I have been using this at night without any issues. It did freshen the air and I had a better sleep.I liked the setting options, particularly the sleep and auto sensor. It has a timer and 3 fan settings, I usually used the fan at the lowest setting, as it runs quieter. This air purifier can check air particle information, which you can also manually check. I sort of wish it could have an ozone level check too.I liked the good cleaning information, but there wasn't any mention on changing or cleaning the charcoal filter. I'm assuming that would be part of the HEPA filter cleaning as one unit.All in all, with the environmental issues these days, its good to have a good air purifier around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars AROEVE Air Purifiers For Home Large Room Up to 1395 Sq Ft with Laser Air quality sensor
reviews.reviewText: It is a good looking unit with a solid built feel to it.The controls are really easy to use, filter removal is also easy to do.I like that it has an Air quality Laser sensor, you should vacuum it once in a while, that will make the fan speed change based on air quality when set to 'Auto' mode.The fan noise is not too bad but it is a little louder than my existing air purifiers of the same size as this unit.This unit also draws a lot more power than my existing unit, see pictures, not sure why that is.Low = 13WMed = 25WHigh = 33WI really like the unit and it will used in the living room so the noise is a big deal.BTW, I cannot find the replacement filter and the cost of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Improved air quality from a compact unit
reviews.reviewText: The Aroeve air purifier was packaged for transit and arrived in excellent condition. A plastic bag protects the inner filter and must be removed before operating this appliance. Out of the box, this unit has a noticeably compact size, which makes it fit discreetly into most any room. Compared to other similar purifiers rated for approximately 1400 sq ft, the compact size makes this unit a more ideal fit. This air purifier has multiple functions controlled by the push button interface, including an automatic mode, which chooses a fan speed based on the detected air pollutants. So far – on the automatic mode - this unit has operated only on the low speed and is very quiet. The filter for this unit is multi-staged, including a washable screen for pet hair and bigger airborne debris – a feature I love because it helps to prolong the life of the inner filter. Another positive is the inside MK07 filter as it is easy to access and replace (and at an affordable cost). This purifier is mainly designed for removal of dust, allergens and pet dander – all of which it has seemed to perform very well at my house. The unit apparently is able to remove strong odors, but I haven’t yet been able to assess this function, but the filtered air flowing from the top of the unit definitely smells clean. Highly recommend this unit for anyone needing to improve their inside air quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible and worth it
reviews.reviewText: I am so, so pleased with how well this air filter works. I have the smaller, one room version of the Aroeve filter, but this is such an upgrade. Here are the pros and cons...Pros:1. This isn't as big as I expected it to be. Sure, it's got some weight to it and it's noticeable in a room, but if you put it in a corner, you're not going to notice it.2. It has several different modes that include a sleep feature to ensure quiet operation. It doesn't run constantly unless you want it to. When it's on a quieter mode, you won't hear it. When it's on a louder mode, it's like a sound machine, although not overly loud. You can block it out pretty easily.3. It filters different size particles, and you get to choose what size it filters. There are three different options, which is nice, because it can be customized for your environment. I filter out dog and cat fur, along with some allergens native to my area. The room smells SO much cleaner and I haven't had to take an allergy pill since I've ran this thing.4. The filter is washable! You can spray it down in the kitchen sink or vacuum it when it's a little furry or dusty. It's useful up to 3000 hours, which is impressive.Cons:1. Honestly, none. It cleans my entire apartment twice in an hour, which is impressive. For a larger house, this is perfect. For an apartment, you'll never notice funky smells and allergens again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Air Purifier in a Compact Size
reviews.reviewText: My wife is very susceptible to many smells and pollens so finding this air purifier was just what she needed. This compact unit really packs a punch when it comes to cleaning the air. It's 4-stage filtering technology assures every square inch of our air is cleaned to the max. Replacement HEPA filters are available on Amazon for around $30. The many features of this machine are amazing. We use this in our RV when traveling and also take it into our room when staying at a hotel. The unit is very lightweight but still delivers the performance of a bigger unit. We absolutely love this purifier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this larger sized purifier to put in my living room, and it has been doing a nice job. The built in screen is nice to be able to see the concentration of various pollutants. After a couple hours of use, each of the pollutants was significantly reduced. One went from 8 to 1, and another went from 5 to 0. Definitely helped clean the air pretty well!
